message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 3:2.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm willing to negotiate further.
I believe a fair division would be equal shares. Each receiving $500000.
I'll give you a tiny share, but I want to make sure I get the majority.
I think a reasonable division would be 4:6. I'm willing to give up some of my share to ensure fairness.
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm still taking the majority.
I propose a division of 3.5:6.5. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
